summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4836 for the improvement of the alley in blocks 29, 30 and 31, D.T. Denny's Home Addition, being the alley from Denny Way to Republican Street, between Warren Avenue and 1st Avenue North, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 55710, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
